comments:
Build ID: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Have an editor opened and maximize the editor page to cover the whole of eclipse
2. close all the pages(if more than one is open)
3. minimize using the Ctrl-M option

I just tried what I thought was your scenario and didn't get an NPE. I did the following:

In the Java perspective I opened a few editors, maximized the editor area and then closed them all (which in my case ended up un-maximizing the editor area).

So, a few questions are in order...

By 'close all the pages', do you mean all the editors? Close all the perspectives perhaps?

Are you using a 'regular' perspective (i.e. Java, Debug...) or is there a particular perspective that you using?

If you can provide steps to repro it'd be much appreciated.

Ravi sent me (in an email...Ravi, next time just post to the bug, I mpay more attention to this than I do my email...;-):

"I can''t seem to replicate it! I'll let you know the next time I run
over the same problem. Thanks. Ravi"

So iwth that I'm going to mark this as WORKSFORME...
